author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

In the context of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/43162. More specifically
* Converts the multi-source design document to Markdown
* Adds a rudimentary README for the package, listing the main components and short description of their role
* Adds a few comments to the code

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1270

#### PR validation:

None
title: Small improvements to XrdAdaptor documentation
